com.github.wuic.nut.core
Class ProxyNutDao

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.nut.core.ProxyNutDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
NutDao
public class ProxyNutDao
extends Object
implements NutDao

Internal NutDao class that maps particular path to a particular Nut when the NutDao.create(String) method is invoked. If the path is not mapped, then a delegated DAO is called.

Since:
0.4.4
Version:
1.0
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

addRule

public void addRule(String path,
                    Nut nut)

Adds a mapping between a path and a nut.

Parameters:
path - the path

observe

public void observe(String realPath,
                    NutDaoListener... listeners)
             throws StreamException

Adds a set of listeners to be notified when an update has been detected on the nut. The targeted nut is represented by the specified path.

Specified by:
observe in interface NutDao
Parameters:
realPath - the real path name of the nut.
listeners - some listeners to be notified when an update has been detected on a nut
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O occurs while retrieving last update of the nut

create

public List<Nut> create(String path)
                 throws StreamException

Creates a list of nuts thanks to the given path considered as represented in any format.

Specified by:
create in interface NutDao
Parameters:
path - the path representing the location of the nut(s)
Returns:
the created nut(s)
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the nut

create

public List<Nut> create(String path,
                        NutDao.PathFormat format)
                 throws StreamException

Creates a list of nuts thanks to the given path.

A NutDao.PathFormat also gives information on the format used in the string representation of the given path.

Specified by:
create in interface NutDao
Parameters:
path - the path representing the location of the nut(s)
format - the path format
Returns:
the created nut(s)
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the nut

proxyUriFor

public String proxyUriFor(Nut nut)

Returns an URI in a String representation of a proxy serving the given nut.

If many proxies are defined, proxy URI is selected in a round-robin mode. Each time a proxy is used, it won't be reused until all other proxies have been used too.

Specified by:
proxyUriFor in interface NutDao
Parameters:
nut - the nut
Returns:
the proxy URI, null if not proxy is set

save

public void save(Nut nut)

Saves the give nut. An UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown if the implementation supports only nut access.

Specified by:
save in interface NutDao
Parameters:
nut - the nut to save

saveSupported

public Boolean saveSupported()

Indicates if this DAO is able to save a nut, which depends on the underlying protocol.

Specified by:
saveSupported in interface NutDao
Returns:
true if NutDao.save(Nut) is supported, false otherwise
